title: Fallen Hero Dedication Ceremony
body:
Lieutenant Governor Anthony G. BrownFOP Lodge 89 and Mrs. Kelly Findley Cordially invite you to a  Dedication Ceremony for                                          Prince George’s County Police Sgt. Richard Findley.

The ceremony will include the unveiling of the dedication sign for Sgt. Findley to be located Rte 197, from Bowie Road to Briarcroft Road, followed by a reception.

Monday, August 16th, 2010

10:00 am

at
FOP Lodge 
Upper  
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
